text.en: Essence of the buddhas, of past, present and future, embodiment of the four kāyas, glorious precious lama, to you I pray, from the depths of my heart:
text.en-trans: dü sum sangye tamché kyi ngowo ku zhi daknyi palden lama dampa la solwa deb so

text.en: Grant your blessings, so I may receive all the empowerments;
text.en-trans: dak la wang kurwar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Grant your blessings, so the extraordinary realization of the profound path may be born in me;
text.en-trans: zablam gyi tokpa khyeparchen gyü la kyewar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Grant your blessings, so I may realize the view of the natural state, of primordial purity;
text.en-trans: kadak neluk kyi tawa tokpar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Grant your blessings, so I may perfect the wisdom of the four visions of spontaneous presence.
text.en-trans: lhündrub nang zhi yeshe tarchinpar jingyi lab tu sol
